snippet: For months, Damascus has hunched in a defensive crouch as fighting raged in suburbs, but a rebel advance has created a new level of alarm and disorder.
abstract: Rebel advance in Damascus, Syria, creates a new level of alarm and disorder, after months of defensive fighting that has raged in its suburbs.

byline.original: By an employee of The New York Times in Damascus, Syria and ANNE BARNARD
byline.contributor: Anne Barnard reported from Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: For months, Damascus has hunched in a defensive crouch as fighting raged in suburbs, but a rebel advance has created a new level of alarm and disorder.

headline.seo: Syrian War Closes In on the Heart of Damascus
headline.main: Damascus on Edge as War Seeps Into Syrian Capital
headline.print_headline: War Closes In On the Heart Of Damascus

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
